item.title: True Crime Gets Fresh Angles as FilmRise Expands Portfolio With International Co-Productions
item.description: FilmRise has inked deals for two true crime series that will explore the psychological elements driving fatal crimes. The streaming distributor will co-produce “Murder in Mind” with CBS AM
